translations.title: ๐ What is Ghusl?
translations.desc: In Islam, Ghusl (ritual bath) is a full-body purification required in certain circumstances. It is an act of worship that removes major ritual impurity (janabah, menstruation, post-natal bleeding) and prepares a Muslim for prayer and other acts of worship. Ghusl is performed by washing the entire body thoroughly with the intention of purification.

  • After post-natal bleeding.
